system.specialRules: Must move at at least half crusing speed at all times or fall to the ground, which also occurs if craft is immobilised in any way. Can instead count as a skimmer for up to 2 minutes per hour, following skimmer rules instead of flyer rules (including move or fall rule). Augur Operator can use an inbuilt auspex, providing +20 to Awareness and Scrutiny Tests and can perform Auspex Scans up to 50km range.
